open-source.text: Calystone is open-source. Explore the project at {0}.

overview.text: Calystone helps you organize your life through your file system, offering note taking and task management features. Learn more about its capabilities and motivation in this {0}.

privacy.text: The project prioritizes privacy. It does not track or store data about you or your files. That said, be aware of the policies for any service you choose. Read more in the {0} and the {1}.
